text: I like how this channel is just filled with an endless stream of unanswered questions :smile:
One could say they just never reach an endpoint.... I'll see myself out

<@UCGBUH5TM> As of today, the best place to ask API related questions is in the API forum: <https://integrate.HubSpot.com/>

As of today - Most of the folks in this slack are more front-end ... so it's harder to get answers on API here. There are 1-2 dedicated HubSpotters answering questions in the API forum :slightly_smiling_face:
Not the best to have two places to ask questions... we're working on making it better. But for now, I'd recommend jumping into API forum for any API related questions.

topic: We also have an API forum with dedicated support reps to help :point_right: Visit: <http://integrate.HubSpot.com|integrate.HubSpot.com>
